data.name: Summon Hellguard
data.tooltip:
Summons <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraSummon_CreateUnit.spawn_count" style="Bold"/> Hellguards to attack nearby enemies.

Hellguards have <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraSummon_Unit.vital_health.maximum"/> health and do <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraSummon_UnitWpnDamage.amount" style="Bold"/> damage per hit, applying soulbrand on the enemies they damage.

Summoning new batch kills previous one.
